_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The five things a mendicant with defilem: Deliberately take the life of a living creature
Take something with the intention to steal
Store up goods for their own enjoyment like they did as a lay person
The nine things a mendicant with defilem: Deliberately take the life of a living creature
Take something with the intention to steal
Store up goods for their own enjoyment like they did as a lay person
